timeline.bodyText: I was thinking that this code will be difficult to maintain and  might not cover all the cases. I think this StringEscapeUtils.unescapeJson(clientFormResponse.getClientForm().getJson()) is better. I also think that we should save the json unescaped just like the event & client JSONs are saved in the tables. This will mean that you only have to unescape it once during download. After that, the JSON will be like standard JSON, easy to ready, debug & work with
